attributes.action: provide carers or family with funding to adapt rooms with in their homes to be used as a specialist room to enable families or carers to carry out this procedure in the patients home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although this will cost the government some cost in the interim it will save more money,the carers only get £50 per week caring 24 hours, the NHS will spend much more with nurses time and equipment it will save in the long term and the sanity of the patient having to attend hospital 3 times a week for 4.5 hours at a time.plus the cost of transport there and back, I wish we had the money to provide this for our selves but having to finish work to become a carer and be on benefit there is no way we can save. This is very demorolising.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
